check_box.label: Deferred Rendering
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles Deferred Rendering adding shadows cast by and on Prims, Avatars and the World aswell as uses a new lighting which allows Projected Lights/Textures which can also drop shadows. Vertex Shader, Atmospheric Shader, Post Process Glow and Hardware Skinning are needed to use this!
check_box.name: Deferred

check_box.label: Light Softening
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles Shadow, SSAO and Light Softening, blurs shadows and ssao to make them look smooth, might have a slight impact on overall look of the lighting in deferred without Shadows or SSAO enabled.
check_box.name: UseBlurLight

check_box.label: Volumetric Lighting
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles if experimental volumetric light should be rendered, causing godrays in certain circumstances
check_box.name: Godrays

check_box.label: Directional Volumetric Lighting
check_box.tool_tip: Toggle if Volumtric Lighting should fade out the further you look away from the Sun. Mimics original Godrays behavior a bit.
check_box.name: RenderGodraysDirectional

check_box.label: Screen Space Ambient Occlusion
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles SSAO which adds small dark edges and transitions to close objects making them look more realistic.
check_box.name: UseSSAO

check_box.label: Screen Space Reflections
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles Screen Space Reflections on shiny surfaces creating very realistic reflective surfaces but will need a monstrous PC
check_box.name: RenderScreenSpaceReflections

check_box.label: Depth of Field
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles a camera like Depth of Field effect on or off, often used to blur out distance or things that shouldnt be in focus
check_box.name: UseDoF

check_box.label: Include Alphas into Depth
check_box.tool_tip: Toggle if the Viewer should include alphas and particles into the depth map (can cause some erratic behavior with Depth of Field blurring on Alphas and Volumetric Lighting on Alphas). If disabled this will cause Depth of Field and Volumetric Lighting to ignore Alphas entirely and they will change their lighting back to as if Depth of Field is disabled.
check_box.name: RenderDepthOfFieldAlphas

check_box.label: High Quality Depth of Field
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles between the old, slow, high quality Depth of Field and the new, faster, lower quality Depth of Field.
check_box.name: RenderDepthOfFieldHighQuality

check_box.label: Tone Mapping
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles if Tone Mapping should be used while Deferred Rendering is active, it might cause the whole scene to look more/less colorfull and increase/decrease the overall scene brightness difference making the scene look dull
check_box.name: ToneMapping

check_box.label: Motion Blur
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles if fast movement should be blurred
check_box.name: MotionBlur

check_box.label: Lens Flare
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles if lens flare post effects should be rendered when facing the sun
check_box.name: LensFlare

check_box.label: Render World Lights
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles unattached normal and projected lights in Deferred Rendering on or off.
check_box.name: RenderDeferredLights

check_box.label: Render Self Attached Lights
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles rendering of lights which are attached to your own Avatar on or off.
check_box.name: attached_own_lights

check_box.label: Render Other Attached Lights
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles rendering of lights which are attached to other Avatars on or off. Useful for annoying facelights.
check_box.name: attached_other_lights

check_box.label: Render Attached Particles
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles rendering of particles which are attached to your or other Avatars on or off. Usefull for particle spammers
check_box.name: attached_particles

check_box.label: Enable Fullbright
check_box.tool_tip: Tell the Viewer to ignore the Fullbright flags on Object creation resulting in no Fullbrights until restart/revisit - WARNING! , does not work with Objects that use an old set prim attribute LIGHT script command!
check_box.name: EnableFullbright

slider.label: Transition Time:
slider.tool_tip: Set how much seconds Windlight transitions between preset selections should take
slider.name: BlurDistance

slider.label: Blur Size:
slider.tool_tip: Set the strength of each blur pass of shadows
slider.name: BlurSize

slider.label: Distance Closest:
slider.tool_tip: This option controls the space in meters the first and closest shadowmap covers. Affects precision of shadows in the first of four areas all shadows cover.
slider.name: RenderShadowDistance_X

slider.label: Shadow Distance:
slider.tool_tip: <icon>Stat_Dot1</icon> Performance <icon>Stat_Dot2</icon> Graphics <icon>ToolTip_Spacer</icon>This option roughly controls the space in meters all shadowmaps cover. Affects precision of shadows in all four areas all shadows cover.
slider.name: RenderShadowFarClip

slider.label: Distance Close:
slider.tool_tip: This option controls the space in meters the second shadowmap covers. Affects precision of shadows in the second of four areas all shadows cover.
slider.name: RenderShadowDistance_Y

slider.label: Distance Far:
slider.tool_tip: This option controls the space in meters the third shadowmap covers. Affects precision of shadows in the third of four areas all shadows cover.
slider.name: RenderShadowDistance_Z

slider.label: Distance Very Far:
slider.tool_tip: This option controls the space in meters the fourth and last shadowmap covers. Affects precision of shadows in the last of four areas all shadows cover.
slider.name: RenderShadowDistance_W

slider.label: Blur Size:
slider.tool_tip: Set the strength of each blur pass of SSAO
slider.name: SSAOBlurSize

slider.label: Field of View(°):
slider.name: CameraFOV
slider.tool_tip: Vertical camera field of view for Depth of Field effect (in degrees)

slider.label: F-Number:
slider.name: CameraFNum
slider.tool_tip: Camera f-number value for Depth of Field effect

slider.label: Focal Length(mm):
slider.name: CameraFocal
slider.tool_tip: Camera focal length for Depth of Field effect (in millimeters)

slider.label: Circle of Confusion:
slider.name: CameraCoF
slider.tool_tip: Set the Camera circle of confusion

slider.label: Transition Time(s):
slider.name: CameraFocusTrans
slider.tool_tip: Time taken to alter focus from one place to the next

slider.label: Resolution:
slider.name: CameraDoFRes
slider.tool_tip: Set the Resolution (Quality) of each DoF pixel

slider.label: Motionblur Quality:
slider.tool_tip: Set the quality of Motionblur, lower values equal to stronger blur
slider.name: MotionBlurQuality

slider.label: Greyscale Strength:
slider.tool_tip: Set the percentual amount of greyscale's strength
slider.name: GreyscaleStrength

slider.label: Sepia Strength:
slider.tool_tip: Set the percentual amount of sepia's strength
slider.name: SepiaStrength

slider.label: Posterize Samples:
slider.tool_tip: Set the number of color shades we render the scene with in Posterization.
slider.name: PosterizationSamples

slider.label: Chromatic Strength:
slider.tool_tip: Set the strength of Chromatic Aberration around the center of the screen
slider.name: ChromaStrength

slider.label: Light Resolution:
slider.tool_tip: Set the resolution of each godray
slider.name: GodrayResolution

slider.label: Light Brightness:
slider.tool_tip: Set the brightness of each godray
slider.name: GodrayMultiplier

slider.label: Light Falloff:
slider.tool_tip: Set the strength of the brightness falloff over distance
slider.name: GodrayFalloffMultiplier

slider.label: Vignette Amount:
slider.tool_tip: Set the strength of the brightness falloff over distance
slider.name: ExodusRenderVignette_X

slider.label: Vignette Strength:
slider.tool_tip: Set the strength of the brightness falloff over distance
slider.name: ExodusRenderVignette_Y

slider.label: Vignette Multiplier:
slider.tool_tip: Set the strength of the brightness falloff over distance
slider.name: ExodusRenderVignette_Z
